code: import React from'react';import'../Components/components.css';import'./pages.css';import{useFadeInAnimation}from'../hooks/useFadeInAnimation';import projectData from'../Data/projects.json';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const Projects=()=>{const fadeInRef=useFadeInAnimation();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"projects",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{ref:fadeInRef,className:"title",children:"Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"projectlist",children:projectData.map(project=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{ref:fadeInRef,className:"project-item bibliography",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"proj-title pub-title",children:[project.title," (",project.year,")"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"proj-authors pub-authors",children:project.people.map((person,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"authorholder",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:project.highlight_people.includes(index)?"highlight_person":"person",children:project.highlight_people.includes(index)?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:person}):person}),index<project.people.length-1?', ':'']},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"proj-description pub-others",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"proj-desc-text",children:project.description})})]},project.title))})]})});};
